blogPost.title: What are some other countries where home cooking is considered best or where restaurant/street food is best, and what are some other characteristics of that culture that might correlate? Communal vs individualistic, maybe? https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t
blogPost.author: Quora

sharedContent.title: There's an interesting divide in food culture between those where home cooking is the best (Italian and at least some parts of the US) and those where restaurant/hawker/street food is the best (Singapore and according to Victoria Tai, Mexico). https://t.co/snSZlCOX17
sharedContent.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 家庭料理が一番とされる国、レストランやストリートフードが一番とされる国、またその文化に関連する他の特徴は何でしょうか？共同体的か個人主義的か、とか？https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t
还有哪些国家的家庭烹饪被认为是最好的，或者餐馆/街头食品是最好的，以及该文化的其他一些可能相关的特点？也许是集体主义与个人主义？https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t
還有哪些國家的家庭烹飪被認爲是最好的，或者餐館/街頭食品是最好的，以及該文化的其他一些可能相關的特點？也許是集體主義與個人主義？https://t.co/UL66C3PU9t

previous.title: Ever heard of Ataloia fever? Dr. Jo tells the story of all the unknown viruses that haven't yet made the headlines: https://t.co/xZk5Hs9yB5 https://t.co/Ys4T5uUJvx

localize.full_text: アタロイア熱って知ってる？ドクター・ジョーが語る、まだ世間を騒がせていない未知のウイルスの数々 https://t.co/xZk5Hs9yB5 https://t.co/Ys4T5uUJvx
听说过阿塔罗尼亚热吗？乔博士讲述了所有尚未上头条的未知病毒的故事： https://t.co/xZk5Hs9yB5 https://t.co/Ys4T5uUJvx
聽說過阿塔羅尼亞熱嗎？喬博士講述了所有尚未上頭條的未知病毒的故事： https://t.co/xZk5Hs9yB5 https://t.co/Ys4T5uUJvx
